1.content:
The School Dorms had just been constructed at U.A, and with everyone moving into their dorms Izuku Midoriya, otherwise known as Deku, decided to spend the rest of the evening to look for some decorations for his new home.
He entered a small fan shop that he had visited many times, hoping to get the latest All Might action figure for his collection. He entered to see the kind young woman working behind the counter, who smiled at him.

“Well well! I haven’t seen you here in quite some time, Midoriya!” she chirped.

“Yeah. I’ve been a little busy with school…” Deku replied, timidly.

“Well! What can I get you? Here for some All-Might merch?”

Deku looked up at the shelf behind her, seeing the latest figure that had caught his attention

“Yeah! Can I get that one there?” he asked. As he pointed to the figure, the tip of his finger emitted a slight green glow. As he did, he noticed the cashier’s eyes briefly flash green, before seeming to glaze over. Her mouth went slack as she just stood there.

“U-uh… sorry about that little flash. I didn’t mean to do that... “ he replied. She did not seem to respond.

“Uhm… so can you grab the figure for me?” he inquired

“...As you wish, Master…” she replied in a monotone as she turned to grab the box from the shelf, and placed it before Deku.

“Did… you just call me Master?”

“I did, Master…” she answered.

Deku’s eyes widened as he placed the payment on the counter. She didn’t go for it.

“Snap out of it!” he said in a blend of worry and frustration. Her eyes seemed to light and she looked around in confusion

“Hm… guess I kinda spaced out there. Well, thanks for your business!” she replied, seeming completely unaware of her previous condition.

With worry, Deku bolted to All Might’s office at the school where he found the soon to be retired hero sitting in his more frail form looking over a lesson plan.

“Ah. Young Midoriya” he said, greeting Deku

“All-Might. We have a problem!”

“Ah? What kind of problem?”

“Well… I uh… I discovered a new power I guess.” he muttered

“Oh? That manifested already huh? Listen kid. There’s something I never mentioned. You know how my power has been passed between a bunch of different people right? Like how I passed it to you? Well, each time that happens a new power is formed based on that person’s… hrm… aptitudes. For you, it would probably be something more nerdy. I mean er… brainey.” he shrugged “So what is it?”

“I don’t really know yet” Deku lied “It happened but I don’t know how I did it or what the effect was. My hand just kinda glowed.”

“Hm… well, may not hurt to try it out. Just know it’s pretty normal for people with One for All” he added, before looking back at his work

“So… I have some kind of mind control power like Shinso..?” he pondered “Maybe I should test it… on… one of the girls” he thought to himself, his temptation taking over.

But who would he test this power on?
1.title: Finding a New Power!

11.content:
Deku's first thought for testing his newfound ability was his close friend, classmate, and crush, Ochako Uraraka.

After arriving back at the dorms around 5 in the afternoon, Deku made his way to her room and knocked on the door. After a moment Ochako answered, wearing her black tank top and gym pants

"Hm? Oh! Hey Deku!" she giggled cutely "Where'd you go today? Nobody could find you!'

"Oh I went shopping then stopped to talk to All-Might." he added

"Ah. I see. Hanging out with teachers and not me huh?" she teased

"Well uh.. actually something weird happened with my powers and I wanted to talk to All-Might since well... since my powers are similar to his."

A look of worry crossed Ochako's face

"Is something wrong with your powers?" she inquired with genuine concern

"Hm? Oh. No no it's just... something weird happened. It was like I unlocked a new power and I don't know what it does yet. It didn't seem harmful but... I can't figure out what it does" he pretended to mope. The two stood in silence for a moment before Ochako stood aside.

"Why don't you come in Deku? You can use it and I'll see if I can tell what it does! Maybe it's something like mine!" she giggled.

Deku entered and Ochako closed the door behind them before sitting down on her bed and smiling at him

"Well? Show me!"

Deku held up his hand and the glow emanated from his fingertip. As it did Ochako's eyes flashed greed briefly before returning to their normal color and emptily stared ahead.

"Ochako..? Can you hear me?" he inquired

"Yes Master..." she responded in a dreary monotone.

Seeing her hypnotized before him, Deku...
11.title: Ochako Uraraka

111.content:
Asks her if she can act like a cat.

“Yes master. I will act like a cat for you.” She then gets on all fours as she begins to act like a cat.

“Huh, I didn’t know you could such a good cat Uraraka” the green hair boy says as he plays with his “pet”.

“Meow.” The brunette said as she leaped onto Deku’s lap. Once she did this, the boy’s face become more red than a tomato as she nuzzled her head on his chest as she began to lay down on him. He then raised his hand, albeit more slower than the tin-man before he got oiled, and began to stroke her head calmly.

“N-N-N-Nice k-k-kitty.” The broccoli boy said as he was still petting the brunette with rosey cheeks.

“Purrr” is all she responded with. He then got a little bored and then asked her to...

1151.content:
Deku had decided that his feelings for Uraraka aside for way too long. “Ochako Uraraka; I know that you’re hypnotized by me and all. But, there’s something I wanted to tell you for a long time. Something I held off so I could on being a hero. And that thing is... well, I love you. So... will you please be my girlfriend?” The broccoli boy asked the hypnotized brunette.

“Yes master... I will be your girlfriend and do whatever you say.” She replied. The ninth one-for-all user lifted his with tears of joy. He then hugged his hypnotized girlfriend and they kissed. Years have passed since and now the two are living happily together as a family with 2 kids, with Ochako taking care of them while Deku is off doing hero work.

11511.content:
Deku then woke up, finding himself in his bed and at the Heights Alliance still. “Oh... I guess it was all a dream.”

He said to himself before laying down again. He then thought ‘What if I do have a power that hypnotizes people. I’ll probably ask Uraraka tomorrow to come into my room and maybe hope nothing that power wasn’t a dream.’ He then went to sleep. It was Saturday today and all of Class 1-A had nothing to do. Ochako was in the common area talking to all the girls when the local cinnamon roll arrived to ask her something.

“Oh, hey Deku-Kun. What’s up?” She asked.

“Hey Uraraka-San. I was wondering if you would stop by room sometime if you want.” He asked her.

“O~! I can imagine where this is going!” Mina had said.

“Not now Mina! Anyways, sure Deku-Kun. Let’s go.” Ochako said.

“W-Wait! You want to do it now?!” The boy asked.

“Yes, I have nothing else planned today.” Ochako replied.

“Oh... ok.” Deku said as the two walked to his room. While walking there, Deku looked at Ochako and became in lost as he looked at her. He then thought to himself ‘She’s so beautiful. Her gorgeous chocolate colored eyes, her beautiful brown hair, her adorable rosy cheeks. She’s the perfect girl I could die for.’ The two then arrive and enter his room.

“So, what is it you wanted to show me again Deku-Kun?” She had asked him. He then closes his eyes, raises his hand in front of her, and when he opens his eyes, a green flash comes out and when he’s able to see, he sees Ochako in his room staring at him.

“Ochako? Can you hear me?” He asked her, worryingly.

“Yes master.” She replies.

‘Yes it worked!’ He thought to himself. Now he asked her, “Hey Ochako, I have a question for you: who do you like? And I don’t mean as a friend, I mean like, LIKE like, like who is your crush?”

“You are my crush master, I loved ever since we first met at the entrance exams.” She says robotically.

He smiles, with tears coming out of his eyes. He then hugs her and kiss her. Now that he knows that she loves him, he...
11511.title: Everything was a dream

12.content:
Realizing that perhaps the insight of the smartest girl in class could help, Deku decided to go for Momo Yaoyorozu first. Plus, there were other benefits to putting her under. She was rich, so he'd be set, and she was incredibly sexy.

He returned to the dorms around 5 that evening and approached her door, knocking on it.

"U-uh! Coming!" he heard from inside as there was a bit of a clamoring from inside

"Aw dammit..." she pouted from within.

The door opened, and some luggage was sprawled on the floor of the room that was cluttered with large, expensive furnishings. Momo herself was dressed in a pink, silk, button-up pajama shirt and matching baggy pants.

"Oh! Izuku I uh... I'm sorry about the mess" she moaned

"It's fine Yamomo! I know your rooms a little... small... for your needs" he shrugged

"Yeah... anyways, what did you need?"

"Well, I was hoping to borrow your smarts for a little bit." he replied

"If you need help studying I'd be happy to help!" she chirped

"It's uh... it's not studying. It's... let's call it analysis. I discovered a new power that I have but I don't know what it does. You're the smartest person I know so I figured..." he stammered. Momo blushed

"I'm... I'm the smartest person you..?" she stammered in reply, before regaining her composure "I'd be happy to help!"

She gently guided Deku into the room.

"Uh... find somewhere to sit while I um..." she said, as she dropped to the floor and started packing the toppled luggage back away, giving Deku a good view down her shirt at her massive breasts.

As she finished putting things away, clearing a good space in the room, she sat on the edge of her bed

"Alright! Now here's what we'll do! You show me this new power -- It won't damage anything right?"

"I doubt it. It seems kinda harmless"

"Great! You show me the new power and I'll take some notes." she said as she pulled out a notepad and pen.

Deku raised his hand as Momo looked down and started writing

"Raises... right... hand... extends... index... finger..." she muttered as she started writing.

"Uh... Yamomo?"

She looked back up

"Hm? Oh! Sorry! Taking notes! Go ahead!"

Deku activated his power as a green light glowed from his fingertip. Her eyes flashed green briefly in response before reverting to normal, and stared ahead with a glassy gaze.

"I think it worked!" Deku assured himself in thought

"Hey uh... Momo? Say something."

"Something." she replied in a robotic monotone.

"Perfect! Now let's get to the testing..." Deku started before...
12.title: Momo Yaoyorozu

choices: Tested one of the simple triggers (RC which)
123.content:
Deku then realized that, despite knowing he has this power and how to activate it, he didn't really know how far he could go with it. What types of orders could he give? Would girls do ANYTHING? Could he completely overwrite people's personalities? Could he program them to respond to certain things in certain ways?

He figured he'd take it a bit more slowly and try a few of these out... first being simple triggers.

"Alright Momo. I'm going to give you some uhm... let's say programs. So that when I say certain things when you aren't in this trance you'll do a certain thing, alright?" he said

"As you desire, Master" she replied, staring blankly ahead.

"Okay. Let's start small... first; if I say 'I could use some help' you'll do whatever you can to help me with whatever I'm doing. So giving me the answers to homework, cleaning my dorm, anything like that." he began.

"Then if I say 'Want to have a study session?" you'll go somewhere private with me. Your mind will take it as the idea that we'll be studying, but will accept any deviations from that"

He began to look over the sexy, pajama-clad girl before her... he knew he had to be a bit more brave with this. So he started upping the stakes of his commands.

"Then if I say... 'No more IQ' you'll dumb down to being basically a cave woman." he added. Knowing that making Momo essentially lose all intelligence would be a good test of how potent these powers are.

"And finally if I say 'Deku says' followed by any order, you'll follow it. Much like the game Simon says." he finished.

"Oh. And if at any point I change you somehow, simply saying 'Back to normal' will make you normal Momo again"

"Back to normal" he said. As the light returned to Momo's eyes

"Hmm? Oh... what happened? I feel like... did I fall asleep?! I'm so sorry!" she groaned, thinking she'd fallen asleep while Deku showed off his new power.

Deku then...
123.title: Giving her triggers (Innocent/Playful)

choices: Test out the “No more IQ command.”
Use the want to study command to take her somewhere else
1231.content:
“Oh d-don’t worry about it. You know it happens sometimes right? Listen forget about the quirk for now. It isn’t important really.”

Momo seems a little surprised but understands. “Oh, alright that’s no big deal really, In all honesty you should probably refer to one of the teachers in relation to this matter anyways.”

“Y-yeah you are probably right.” Deku replies, avoiding eye contact with Momo.

“Well do you need help with something else? I can still help you study if you need help.” She happily offers.

“Oh well maybe later. I actually need help ummm...” Deku taps his fingers together nervously as he tries to think of a task for her to do for him.

“A-Actually their is one thing, you see my back and shoulders take a lot of strain when I use my quirk. It causes my body to become all sore and stuff. So I was wondering if you can help me feel better.” Deku asks much to Momo’s surprise.

“W-well I’m not an expert on the subject but I’d recommend you speak to a doctor, Chiropractor, or a Masseuse. Perhaps I may know a book about proper posture in combat for heroes.” She asks earnestly, very confused why Midoriya would bring this up to her specifically.

“Oh no no no, that’s alright. I was thinking that you’d be able to help me personally.”

“Well I’m sorry to say but even with my quirk I wouldn’t know how to help you with this...Specific issue.” Momo feels slightly awkward talking about this.

“Well what I guess what should have said is-“ Demi pauses and gulps as he thinks about what he’s about to ask. “I could use some help with a back massage.” He yelps out.

Momo looks like she was about to say something before her eyes glaze slightly. she blinks a few times and shakes her head subtly before focusing back onto Deku. A confident smile appearing on her face.

“Oh why didn’t you say so in the first place. Of course I’d help you with a massage Deku! I have limited experience but I’m positive I can at least help you out now!” She claps her hands together now eager to help her friend despite the strange request.

“Really? Oh thank you Yamomo. You don’t know how much this means to me.” Deku smiles as his suggestion seems to have worked flawlessly.

“Haha, no worries. I’m going to try and prepare best I can but while I do take off your shirt and lie face down on your back.”

“Yes of cour-Wait What?! Is all that necessary?” Deny asks shocked that momo would suggest putting him in such a compromising position.

She simply nods back.

“Oh but of course, I may not be an expert or have the proper facilities but I know at least the proper position to put someone in when giving a massage. Now quickly get ready.” She urges him to comply.

Despite his shock Deku doesn’t argue but is a bit uneasy feeling having Momo see him shirtless. Regardless he lays face down on her very soft bed. He waited anxiously for Momo as she preps.

“Ok Momo I think I’m ready. Uh.. what happens now?”

“Now I get to work, and hope I remember enough to help out.” She says this as she sits atop of Deku’s back.

“W-What are you doing?!” Deku shouted, his face beat red.

“Oh relax, this is proper Masseuse practices. If you want me to help out with your back you need to calm down and let me work my magic.” She replied as the power of the suggestion made her more focused on doing the task than considering how inappropriate this may be.

“R-right I’ll try.” Knowing that he’s the one who asked for this, Deku does his best to relax and let Momo do her thing.

“Perfect now then let us begin.”

Momo grabs both of Deku’s shoulders and proceeds to massage them. Squeezing his shoulders, pressing down on his upper back, rubbing her soft warm hands along him. Even if it wasn’t proper feeling Momo stop him was an amazing sensation.

“How are you feeling so far?”

“Amazing.” He said with a large blissful smile.

“That’s wonderful, now I’m going to try to do some deep tissue work. Hopefully this isn’t too rough, I’d like to remind you I’m not educated in the matter so if I cause discomfort, inform me;” momo explains before she leans in.

What she does realize or is oblivious to is that as she leans forward and down atop of Deku her large soft breast begin to press down on his back. As she moves around Demi can feel both of them press and rub against his back.

“Are you feeling better Deku?”

“Oh yes very much so!”

Momo smiles as she was able to help Deku despite her lack of experience. Eventually finishing up and getting off of him.

“Perfect well hopefully that’ll make you feel at least a little better, like I said you should probably consult an expert on the issue.”

“R-right, I’ll try to remember.” Deku replies putting his shirt back on still thinking about the massage and smiling. Clearly the trigger worked like a charm.

“So if you wouldn’t mind try not to bring this up to others ok? I’m not really an expert like I said and it’s kind of well embarrassing in retrospect.,,” she said blushing a bit.

“A-Anyways anything else I can do for you Deku before you leave? Do you still need help studying?”

Wanting to truly test the extent of this power, Deku decided to be a little more bold.

"Well, first I just wanted to do a sort of psychology experiment. Ms. Midnight gave it to me specifically for some extra credit. I'm just going to say some phrases, and you'll let me know how they make you feel."

Momo thought a moment, not certain why Deku had asked to study if this was his intention.

"Come on Momo. I could use some help with this!" he said, invoking her previous trigger.

"Well, if you say so. I'd be happy to help! What's the first phrase?"

Deku smiled as he looked Momo square in the eyes

"No more IQ" he said simply. As he did, Momo's eyes faded from their usual, alert appearance to a more dull sight. She looked about with seemingly no idea what was happening or where she was.

She squatted down, looking around. She shuffled over to her bed and tugged on the blankets.

"Uungh?" she questioned as she gave it a more potent tug, sending the blankets and pillows scattering across the room. She started leaping around excitedly.

"Uugh! Uungh! Oof!"

She felt the tug of her clothing and looked down. She gripped the collar of her shirt and sniffed it.

"Uuuuh?" she questioned again, looking at Deku. Before...
12311.title: Test out the “No more IQ command.”

13.content:
As Deku approached the dorms he heard a series of splashing, followed by some sounds of celebration from the woods around the dorms.

Following the sound Deku found his friend and classmate Mina Ashido standing in the forest, seemingly having just melted a rock using her acid quirk.

"Hey Mina!" Deku said with a smile

"Hm? Oh! What's up Izuku?! Did you see what I did?" she said with a giant grin as she pointed to the melted rock

"Yeah! Out here practicing your abilities? Trying to make your quirk stronger?"

"Well duh! Of course I am! We should all be right? Hey! Wanna train with me? Uh-- I mean, not like... we use our quirks against each other. That would probably be dangerous. But like me and you just use our powers together and give each other pointers as to what we see being done wrong!"

"Sounds great!" Deku boomed, knowing this was the perfect opportunity for him to test his new ability on Mina.

"Alright! Awesome! I'll start!"

Mina fired a blast of acid at another rock. It splashed onto it and slowly melted it, but only half of it.

"Aw dammit!" she grumbled

"Why didn't you get closer? Your abilities would be easier to aim from closer, and a rock won't fight back. Treat it like an unaware enemy. Or even a lock you need to melt! It's better to get closer!" Deku tutored

"That makes a ton of sense! Thanks!" she giggled "Your turn! Show me what you can do Deku!"

Deku smiled as he held up his hand and pointed his index finger. It glowed green briefly, as did Mina's eyes in response. As the power faded and Mina's eyes reverted to normal she stood there slack and motionless as she stared blankly ahead

"Mina. If you can hear me just hop once." he said.

"Yes...Master..." Mina said in a dreamy voice before bouncing in place once.

With this settled, and Mina under his control, Deku decided to...

1441.title: Brought Jiro Out of her trance to test them

151.content:
Upon thinking of who he would try this new Quirk on, the first person he thought of Mei. Quickly making his way over to the support course labs, and definitely not thinking of when Mei felt him up! He eventually arrives

*BOOM*

The sound of an explosion rings out, immediately upon hearing the noise Izuku slams the steel doors open. Looking around for anyone he spots Mei fanning away smoke from a machine, crying out "MY BABY!!" All the while.

Seeing this Izuku walks up and takes off his shirt, before he starts to help clear out the smoke. After a few minutes, the duo clears the smoke. Sweat glistens off both their forms as Izuku tries desperately to not stare at her peachy peaks. "U-Um Hatsume! Are you alright?!" He says quickly trying to distract himself.

Mei looks at Izuku, "Oh I'm fine! ..... who are you again?" She asks with a non-guilty smile. Izuku' eyes twitch a bit, "Izuku Midoriya, you made some support items for me, remember?" Izuku asks with a frown thinking "Really you'd think she would remember me by now!"

"Uhhhh.... Nope! Anyway you need something, maybe one of my babies!?" She half yells at him, turning around to look at the machine that started the smoke.

Izuku takes a deep breath thinking, "You know what I'll make sure she remembers me this time!" He reaches his finger up, it glows a far brighter jade green than the more dimmer mint green of before. "Actually I have s-a baby that needs repairs! You mind looking at it?" He lies quickly.

Mei turns around goggles over her eyes, the jade light on Izuku's finger seems to move like a tendril around Mei's goggles. The gold of the goggles lenses turn a bright jade green as Mei goes still. Izuku grins as he walks up to Mei, "Who am I Hatsume?" A monotone voice answers back, "I forgot Master"

Izuku eyes twitch as he hears this, "Is she an idiot! How hard is it to remember someone's name!?" He thinks as decides to.....
151.title: Mei Hatsume

153.content:
Izuku had decided to leave the dorms again, but this time to test his new power on the villain Himiko Toga. He went out wearing beat up jeans, an All Might hoodie, and black socks. He searched almost every alley and asked anyone if they saw someone wearing a school uniform with blonde hair and fangs to no avail. Unbeknownst to the broccoli boy though, that same girl was secretly watching him from the rooftops with a black cloak around her. As Deku was walking through, thinking about which of his friends to test his powers on and how to use his new power in general, he passed a house with which he was incredibly familiar. The home of his friend and rival Katsuki Bakugo. And with that he remembered a childhood crush of his. Katsuki's incredibly sexy mother Mitsuki. As well, Deku recalled Bakugo mentioning that his father was going out of town on business for a week or so... this was his chance!

Deku approached the door to the Bakugo home and gently knocked. After a moment, it opened, revealing the blonde haired, big busted milf; Mitsuki.

"Oh! Izuku! It's been a while since I saw you last!" she said with a smile as the young Hero stood before her. "I heard you're in Katsuki's class! He talks about you from time to time!"

"O-oh uh... he does?" Deku questioned. He doubted any conversation about himself coming from Ka-chan could be nice.

"Mhm! Anyway, what are you doing here?" Mitsuki inquired

"Oh! Ka-chan asked me to grab something for him from home since I was in the area" he said with a weak smile, hoping she didn't see through his lie

"Ha! I know he gives you a hard time, but I always knew he relied on you" Mitsuki joked as she stepped aside "Come on in. I'll make you some tea"

Deku entered the house and made his way to Bakugo's old room while Mitsuki made for the kitchen. He rooted around for a moment before just grabbing some random nick knacks and tossing them into his bag in case Mitsuki asked, and headed out of the room.

As he walked out, he saw Mitsuki sitting on the couch, smiling at him.

"Well! Take a seat! The tea's started so it shouldn't be too long. And I haven't talked to you in years!"

Izuku sat down across from her, placing his bag beside him

"Soo. My little Katsuki was telling me about your quirk! Late bloomer huh?" Mitsuki joked

"Y-yeah kinda. Did you see me use it in the tournament?"

"Of course I did! It looks like it has a lot of uses. Not like my Katsuki. Just a bunch of explosions." she grumbled

"It actually does have a lot of cool uses! It's a really versatile power. It even has uses outside of fighting!" he said with pride.

"Oh? Show me. It'll be nice to at least be proud of one of the local boys for having a power that isn't just destructive" she joked.

Deku held up his finger. Mitsuki's eyes fixed on it with a smile. Then the green light radiated from his fingertip. Her eyes quickly flashed green in response before glazing over. Her lips fell from her smile to a neutral position as she stared ahead.

He'd done it! Mitsuki was under his control! The question was... what to do with her?

When I say that, you're going to become a stereotypical version of that type of person. However you'll be completely loyal and beholden to me. So in the secretary example you'd be MY personal secretary. You'd be willing to do anything for me, but your primary job would be screening my calls, getting in contact with others, and boosting my fame. Does that make sense?" he inquired

"Yes Master..." she responded.

"Alright. In that case... Mitsuki from this moment forward you are my..." he began
155311.title: Change her personality to suit him and his needs?

choices: Record Mitsuki doing humiliating things in her home
Plant some humiliating triggers in Mitsuki and send her out into the city
155312.content:
At this moment, looking over the mesmerized MILF, a strange sensation came over Deku.

This woman was his rival's mother. And despite how much he cared for Bakugo as a friend, part of him was sick of being the punching bag. He decided that perhaps the way to get back at Bakugo... was to humiliate his mother,

Deku decided to...
155312.title: Humiliate his rival's mother?

15533.content: Okay who will it be then?
15533.title: Someone else

155332.content:
Deku has decided to get help from someone he rarely spoke to, and that person was Setsuna Tokage of Class 1-B. During his lunch hour the next day, Deku was looking around for the body-part separating quirk user when by some coincidence they both bumped into each other. “O-Oh! Hi! You must Setsuna Tokage, right?” The green haired boy asked.

“Yeah, why? Who’re you?” The green haired girl had asked. “Oh! My name is Izuku Midoriya, and I wanted to ask you something.” “Ok... what is it?” She replied.

“Well... I’ve been having some trouble with my quirk and I wanted to see if you would like to come down to my dorm to help come and see it.” The broccoli boy said to her as she awkwardly nodded in agreement. After school, Setsuna did what Deku had told her to do. Go to his dorm after school. Once she got there, she knocked on his door. He went to get and found her outside. When she walked in, Deku flashed his eyes green and she fell under. “Ok... I think it worked. Tokage, say something cool.”

“Something cool...” she responded with an almost robotic sounding voice. Deku had then commanded her to...
155332.title: Setsuna Tokage

info.brief_description: Izuku "Deku" Midoriya discovers a new power within One For All... Mind Control!
info.description:
My fourth Hypnosis-Based story. This time in My Hero Academia! (I decided to remake this because the other did not turn out quite as I had hoped. I hope this version proves to be better!)

Please check out my other stories (And yes, I plan to make more!)

RWBY: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2168279-Hypnotic-Adventures-in-RWB...
Pokemon: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2168408-Ash-and-the-Hypnos-Pendant...
Dragonball: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2169849-Dragonball-Yamchas-Hypnoti...


Rules:
- No Death, Gore, BDSM, Vore, Scat, peeing, Malesub, M/M or Pregnancy.
- Always leave a "something else" option.
- Please refrain from using small chapters UNLESS it's a choice chapter.
- Don't end a story-line unless there is a VERY good reason

I may add more rules later if I think of them but for now... have fun! Feel free to add! Additions are more than welcome!
